kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: POST
kw.msg: POST Request : url=https://serverest.dev/usuarios path_url=/usuarios headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.32.5', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '131', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"nome": "NomeQualquer33", "email": "TestenoiteNomequalquer33@mailinator.com", "password": "Teste@12345", "administrador": "false"}'

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

kw.name: Should Not Be Empty
kw.doc: Verifies that the given item is not empty.
